programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if real audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o partials.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ain diskin2 "fox.wav", 1 fs1,fsi2 pvsifd ain,2048,512,1 ; ifd analysis fst partials fs1,fsi2,.003,1,3,500 ; partial tracking aout resyn fst, 1, 1.5, 500, 1 ; resynthesis (up a 5th) outs aout, aout
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 4096 10 1
i 1 0 2.8 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
